item.title: Alpha
item.description: A tentative list of topics I plan to cover. Modern C++ Project template for Modern C++ Lambdas [](){}; Functional Programming ranges Async IO Memory model Python Workspace setup Functional Programming Async IO High performance Python Extending Python & Python VM internals Rust Building CLI applications Collections Memory model Creating data-pipeline Webassembly Clojure SICP with Clojure Clojure web applications Flutter Learning Dart Using FireBase Using AWS to deploy apps Book Reviews Technical
